A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a big Star Wars fan I went into this movie with no expectations.  I did say if it was a shot for shot remake of ESB I'm walking out and thankfully it was not.  It takes what we know and love about Star Wars and keeps the story going.  I really liked the special and practical effects as well as those few suspenseful moments that had the audience holding their breath. It's great\, it's Star Wars.
